    • Constructor Detail

      • FileMenu.GameController

        public FileMenu.GameController(java.lang.String name,
                       int gameWidth,
                       int gameHeight,
                       int blockWidth,
                       int blockHeight)
        Constructor:
        Parameters:
        name - The game name to be displayed atthe top of the window.
        gameWidth - The width of the game in blocks.
        gameHeight - The height of the game in blocks.
        blockWidth - The width in pixel of a screen block.
        blockHeight - The height in pixel of a screen block.
